Uses of Package
jeus.security.resource

Packages that use jeus.security.resource
jeus.security.base   
jeus.security.resource   
 

Classes in jeus.security.resource used by jeus.security.base
Password
          password implementation.
PrincipalImpl
          이 클래스는 java.security.Principal 인터페이스를 설치하고 user 이름에 대한 jeus.security.api.Subject을 생성하는데 사용된다

Example:

Principal principal = new PrincipalImpl("johan"); Subject subject = new Subject(); subject.getPrincipals().add(principal);

 

Classes in jeus.security.resource used by jeus.security.resource
Password
          password implementation.
PrincipalImpl
          이 클래스는 java.security.Principal 인터페이스를 설치하고 user 이름에 대한 jeus.security.api.Subject을 생성하는데 사용된다

Example:

Principal principal = new PrincipalImpl("johan"); Subject subject = new Subject(); subject.getPrincipals().add(principal);
